'''Olesca Sarasso''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|The dwarven woman at the desk does not yet look up. She taps at her chin with the quill in her hand, a look of furious concentration on her face.

After a few moments, she scrawls something down in the ledger in front of her}}
Assistant to [Director Castol](/directorCastol/), Olesca is an advisor, accountant, and aide to the VTC executive, responsible for keeping the books in order and offering advice on the operations of the fleet. She is a walking repository of knowledge and perhaps one of the most important functionaries in the entire VTC - though her lack of talent for small talk relegates her to the lower rungs of the company's pecking order.

## Interactions

|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           = * As a [Scholar](/scholar/) or with [Diplomacy](/diplomacy/) 2, you get some unique dialogue when asking Olesca what she does.
}}
[Category:Queen's Berth characters](/categoryQueensBerthCharacters/)
